item.title: Android Floating Window
item.author: dave@bennettnotes.com (Dave Bennett)
item.description: One of the most iconic features of the Galaxy Note 3, is the multi-window feature. It’s extremely cool and makes great use of the abundance of screen real estate. Unfortunately, that’s not a nativeÂ Android feature. However, with the help of an Xposed Module, you can achieve the floating affect on any android device. Here’s how to get Android floating window display: What You Will Need: A rooted Android Device Xposed Installer App Halo App(Android 4.
